project_plan.name: Weather Information Fetcher in Python
project_plan.description: Develop a Python program that fetches the current weather information for a specified city using a public API, displaying the temperature, humidity, and weather conditions in the terminal.

task.name: Set up the project environment (install dependencies)
Implement the function to fetch weather data from the public API
Parse the fetched data to extract temperature, humidity, and weather conditions
Implement the function to display the fetched weather information in the terminal
Write tests for the functions implemented above
Execute tests on all implemented features to ensure that they function correctly
